entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
